str2: First, in the first place, before, formerly. Neuter of protos as adverb; firstly.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: A prolonged form of a primary verb; to 'know' in a great variety of applications and with many implications.
Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.
No, not. Also ouk, and ouch a primary word; the absolute negative adverb; no or not.
Prophecy, prophesying; the gift of communicating and enforcing revealed truth. From prophetes; prediction.
(a) a writing, (b) a passage of scripture; plur: the scriptures. A document, i.e. Holy Writ.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: A prolongation and middle voice form of a primary verb; to cause to be, i.e. to become, used with great latitude.
Pertaining to self, i.e. One's own; by implication, private or separate.
Solution, explanation, interpretation; release. From epiluo; explanation, i.e. Application.
